Generation III.Ruby: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pok é mon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
Generation III.Sapphire: Glalie has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its foe solid. After immobilizing its foe in ice, this Pok é mon enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.
Generation III.Emerald: A Glalie has the power to instantaneously freeze moisture in the atmosphere. A dazzling cloud of diamondlike ice crystals forms around its body.
Generation III.FireRed: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.

Generation IV.Diamond: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
Generation IV.Pearl: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
Generation IV.Platinum: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.

Generation VI.X: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
Generation VI.Y: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pokémon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Glalie has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its prey solid. After immobilizing its prey in ice, this Pokémon enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.

Generation VII.Sun: The excess energy from Mega Evolution spilled over from its mouth, breaking its jaw. It spews endless blizzards.
Generation VII.Moon: It envelops prey in its mouth, freezing them instantly. But its jaw is dislocated, so it's unable to eat them.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: When it spews stupendously cold air from its broken mouth, the entire area around it gets whited out.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: The power of Mega Evolution was so strong that it smashed Glalie's jaw. Its inability to eat very well leaves Glalie irritated.

Generation VIII.Sword: It has a body of ice that won't melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
Generation VIII.Shield: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: It covers its body with an armor of ice harder than steel. Uses its breath to freeze prey, which it then devours as if they were frozen desserts.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While they’re in that frozen state, it gobbles them up.
Generation IX.Violet: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
